about_the_game:
Description:
Immerse yourself in the spellbinding chaos of "MagFighter," a top-down multiplayer brawler where mages collide in a spectacular array of magical mayhem! With over 50 spells at your fingertips, every skirmish promises a unique and thrilling experience.

Key Features:

Spell Variety Extravaganza: Choose from a staggering arsenal of 50+ spells, each offering a distinct magical flair. Whether unleashing fiery infernos, summoning tempests, or manipulating gravity, the possibilities are endless.

Dynamic Spell Collisions: Witness the awe-inspiring collisions of spells in a physics-based spectacle. From cascading waterfalls to explosive eruptions, the battlefield is a canvas for your magical creativity.

Strategic Loadout Customization: Craft your strategy by selecting a personalized loadout of 5 spells before each match. With a diverse range of magical abilities, adapt on-the-fly and outsmart your opponents in fast-paced elimination rounds.

GBA-Era Pixel Art Magic: Experience the charm of GBA-era pixel art as you navigate visually enchanting arenas. The whimsical art style adds a delightful touch to the competitive intensity.

Multiplayer Madness: Engage in intense multiplayer showdowns reminiscent of Super Smash Bros., where every round is a free-for-all frenzy. Be the last mage standing to claim victory in these epic magical battles!

No Story, Just Pure Variety: MagFighter thrives on the exhilaration of diverse spellcasting. Dive into the arena, explore the vast magical possibilities, and emerge as the ultimate magus in this variety-packed brawl!

Unleash the Magic, Become the Ultimate MagFighter!
